Pre-Game Insights: The Los Angeles Dodgers play the Colorado Rockies with a 1-0 series lead.
Los Angeles is 92-62 overall and 49-27 at home.
Colorado has a 23-56 record on the road and a 59-95 record overall.
The matchup Saturday is the ninth time these teams have met this season. The Dodgers have a 6-2 advantage in the season series.
